name: Saeni
startIntroPart1: This federal state stands alone, though with many faces within and many names held.
startIntroPart2: The Saenian confederacy will dominate this world.
declaringWar: You are a scourge! Prepare to bledd for our state.
attacked: Our military might will prove superior.
defeated: We may die now, but we will rise again...
introduction: Greetings! We walk a path uncharted! May we speak in good tidings!
hateLetsHearIt: What is so important as to bother us?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Peace in our time is assured, for now.
tradeRequest: This deal shall peak your interest.
